alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 11:57PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Sheridan County through 1130 PM MDT... At 1056 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Box Butte Dam to 16 miles north of Ellsworth. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Diamond Lake, Smith Lake State Wildlife Management Area and Argo Hill. This includes Highway 250 between mile markers 14 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska.
